mapper.select: SELECT T1.CATG_ID , T1.CATG_NM , T1.REG_ID , T2.USER_NM AS REG_NM , TO_CHAR(T1.REG_DT, 'YYYY.MM.DD HH24:MI:SS') AS REG_DT FROM TB_SPUSH_BOARD_CATEGORY T1 LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_SPUSH_USER T2 ON T1.REG_ID = T2.USER_ID ORDER BY T1.CATG_NM

SELECT T1.CATG_ID , T1.CATG_NM , T1.REG_ID , T2.USER_NM AS REG_NM , TO_CHAR(T1.REG_DT, 'YYYY.MM.DD HH24:MI:SS') AS REG_DT FROM TB_SPUSH_BOARD_CATEGORY T1 LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_SPUSH_USER T2 ON T1.REG_ID = T2.USER_ID WHERE T1.CATG_ID = #{CATG_ID} FETCH FIRST 1 ROWS ONLY

SELECT T1.BOARD_ID, T1.BOARD_TYPE, T1.CATG_ID, T2.CATG_NM, T1.TITLE, T1.CONT_TYPE, T1.REG_ID, T3.USER_NM, T4.DEPT_NM, T4.FULL_NM, TO_CHAR(T1.REG_DT, 'YYYY.MM.DD HH24:MI:SS') AS REG_DT, TO_CHAR(T1.MOD_DT, 'YYYY.MM.DD HH24:MI:SS') AS MOD_DT, T1.ATTACH_YN FROM TB_SPUSH_BOARD T1 LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_SPUSH_BOARD_CATEGORY T2 ON T1.CATG_ID = T2.CATG_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_SPUSH_USER T3 ON T1.REG_ID = T3.USER_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_SPUSH_DEPT T4 ON T3.DEPT_CD = T4.DEPT_CD WHERE T1.BOARD_TYPE = #{BOARD_TYPE}
AND T1.CONT LIKE '%' || #{CONT} || '%'
AND T1.TITLE LIKE '%' || #{TITLE} || '%'
AND T3.USER_NM LIKE '%' || #{USER_NM} || '%'
AND T1.CATG_ID = #{CATG_ID}
AND T1.REG_DT BETWEEN TO_DATE(#{REG_START_DATE}, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') AND TO_DATE(#{REG_END_DATE}, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS')
ORDER BY T1.REG_DT DESC
SELECT COUNT(BOARD_ID) AS CNT FROM TB_SPUSH_BOARD WHERE CATG_ID = #{CATG_ID}

SELECT T1.BOARD_ID, T1.BOARD_TYPE, T1.CATG_ID, T2.CATG_NM, T1.TITLE, T1.CONT, T1.CONT_TYPE, T1.REG_ID, T3.USER_NM, T4.DEPT_NM, T4.FULL_NM, TO_CHAR(T1.REG_DT, 'YYYY.MM.DD HH24:MI:SS') AS REG_DT, TO_CHAR(T1.MOD_DT, 'YYYY.MM.DD HH24:MI:SS') AS MOD_DT, T1.ATTACH_YN FROM TB_SPUSH_BOARD T1 LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_SPUSH_BOARD_CATEGORY T2 ON T1.CATG_ID = T2.CATG_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_SPUSH_USER T3 ON T1.REG_ID = T3.USER_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_SPUSH_DEPT T4 ON T3.DEPT_CD = T4.DEPT_CD WHERE T1.BOARD_ID = #{BOARD_ID}

INSERT INTO TB_SPUSH_BOARD (BOARD_ID, BOARD_TYPE, CATG_ID, TITLE, CONT, CONT_TYPE, ATTACH_YN, REG_ID, REG_DT) VALUES( SEQ_TB_SPUSH_BOARD.NEXTVAL, #{BOARD_TYPE,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{CATG_ID,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{TITLE,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{CONT,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{CONT_TYPE,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ATTACH_YN,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{REG_ID,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, (CURRENT TIMESTAMP) )
SELECT SEQ_TB_SPUSH_BOARD.currval as BOARD_ID FROM SYSIBM.SYSDUMMY1

INSERT INTO TB_SPUSH_BOARD_CATEGORY (CATG_ID, CATG_NM, REG_ID, REG_DT) VALUES( SEQ_TB_SPUSH_BOARD_CATEGORY.NEXTVAL, #{CATG_NM,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{REG_ID,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, (CURRENT TIMESTAMP) )
SELECT SEQ_TB_SPUSH_BOARD_CATEGORY.currval as CATG_ID FROM SYSIBM.SYSDUMMY1

UPDATE TB_SPUSH_BOARD_CATEGORY SET CATG_NM = #{CATG_NM,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REG_ID = #{REG_ID,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REG_DT = (CURRENT TIMESTAMP) WHERE CATG_ID = #{CATG_ID}
